reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bright neon sign
reviews.reviewText: I recently added the neon check engine light to my garage decor, and it's an absolute showstopper! This unique piece brings an authentic garage vibe while adding a touch of retro charm to the space. The bright neon light not only catches attention but also serves as a fun conversation starter for guests. The build quality is top-notch, and the installation was a breeze. It's a fantastic way to infuse personality into the garage while paying homage to automotive culture. Whether it's day or night, this eye-catching wall hanging never fails to impress. A must-have for any car enthusiast looking to add a cool, quirky touch to their garage decor!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This came fast there's one thing that needs to C
reviews.reviewText: Wow I really haven't hung it up as of yet. The Brightness is really just That, Bright I gotten this Yellow one. Brings me back to my racing days. The Quality is ok in 2023. But you have to think outside of your thinking. The Appearance is ok also. But what really would bring Quality & Appearance All Together forUs Older Guys that Would Love to Have thisNice Bright Color of these is To Only Have Over our Workbench or Head or our Headboard of our Workbench is the Gears of............. 1..2..3..4....R Some even would Likely Like of....1...2....3...R We are not Really into much at all Anything After Four (4) !! !!It's Just not us,,, into going past that number 4 (four) You could fill in that spot going from Top to Bottom CHEVY OR FORD DODGE AND VW Only cars we had on our Streets plus the Only Gears we had unless you were driving a semi-truck. This might or might not make it in the Reviews if it does you might hear more of us Guys Agreeing with me. Or just give it a try with and without car names. I had a nice Chevy 4 speed 396 cub inch, under the hood. So other than that You'll make usOld Timers Very Happy. Randy of Northern Michigan !!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks great. Very bright.
reviews.reviewText: Very bright and well made. USB power. Put in in my garage as a night light and it lights up all of the 1,800 square foot space where the cars are parked.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely acceptable for the price
reviews.reviewText: The sign is decently bright. Power cord and switch are unremarkable and white in color. If anyone didn't get the memo this isn't a real neon sign, it is an LED that illuminates a strip of plastic that resembles a hot glue gun stick and has a visible seam that wasn't lined up out of the box. That being said, for 30 bucks I don't really notice it all too much.

reviews.reviewText: It's a great sign and it looks cool. I love the color and the amount of light it produces. Excellent!

Build quality seem pretty good, but it's not as pictured at all. The red "check engine" lettering is not there, the fan" part of the signe is of unequal lenght and it also has an extra part that makes no sense (pictured). I'm kinda bumed about this cause if it was just the lettering, I would have kept it, but the fan thing just makes it look goofy.
The boyfriend love IT but the rubber is not fix we had to hot glue IT.I try to have a refund and not available ....very cool but how long Will this last????

What I received was not the same as the picture. It was only the yellow part (the actual check engine light) but not the red letter saying check engine.It’s fine, but when you think you’re receiving what you see in the picture and then the product turns out slightly different, it’s disappointing.
